sn35.74:1.2: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn35.74:1.3: “amukasmim, bhante, vihare annataro bhikkhu navo appannato abadhiko dukkhito balhagilano.
sn35.74:1.4: Sadhu, bhante, bhagava yena so bhikkhu tenupasankamatu anukampam upadaya”ti.
sn35.74:2.1: Atha kho bhagava navavadanca sutva gilanavadanca, “appannato bhikkhu”ti iti viditva yena so bhikkhu tenupasankami.
sn35.74:2.2: Addasa kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam duratova agacchantam.
sn35.74:2.4: Atha kho bhagava tam bhikkhum etadavoca:
sn35.74:2.8: Nisajja kho bhagava tam bhikkhum etadavoca:
sn35.74:2.9: “kacci te, bhikkhu, khamaniyam, kacci yapaniyam, kacci dukkha vedana patikkamanti no abhikkamanti, patikkamosanam pannayati no abhikkamo”ti?
sn35.74:3.1: “Na me, bhante, khamaniyam, na yapaniyam, balha me dukkha vedana abhikkamanti no patikkamanti, abhikkamosanam pannayati no patikkamo”ti.
sn35.74:4.1: “Kacci te, bhikkhu, na kinci kukkuccam, na koci vippatisaro”ti?
sn35.74:5.1: “Taggha me, bhante, anappakam kukkuccam, anappako vippatisaro”ti.
sn35.74:6.1: “Kacci pana tam, bhikkhu, atta silato upavadati”ti?
sn35.74:7.1: “Na kho mam, bhante, atta silato upavadati”ti.
sn35.74:8.1: “No ce kira te, bhikkhu, atta silato upavadati, atha kinca te kukkuccam ko ca vippatisaro”ti?
sn35.74:9.1: “Na khvaham, bhante, silavisuddhattham bhagavata dhammam desitam ajanami”ti.
sn35.74:10.1: “No ce kira tvam, bhikkhu, silavisuddhattham maya dhammam desitam ajanasi, atha kimattham carahi tvam, bhikkhu, maya dhammam desitam ajanasi”ti?
sn35.74:11.1: “Ragaviragattham khvaham, bhante, bhagavata dhammam desitam ajanami”ti.
sn35.74:12.2: Sadhu kho tvam, bhikkhu, ragaviragattham maya dhammam desitam ajanasi.
sn35.74:12.3: Ragaviragattho hi, bhikkhu, maya dhammo desito.
sn35.74:16.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn35.74:18.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, kallam nu tam samanupassitum:
sn35.74:20.1: “Evam passam, bhikkhu, sutava ariyasavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, sotasmimpi nibbindati …pe… manasmimpi nibbindati.
sn35.74:20.2: Nibbindam virajjati; viraga vimuccati; vimuttasmim vimuttamiti nanam hoti.
sn35.74:21.2: Attamano so bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandi.
sn35.74:21.3: Imasminca pana veyyakaranasmim bhannamane tassa bhikkhuno virajam vitamalam dhammacakkhum udapadi:
